comment: Takes way too long to grade things. Rude if you ask a question in class and has zero patience when somebody is struggling to understand the material. Way too many homework assignments for a gen-ed class.

She is really nice, and for someone that struggles with math a great teacher. She gives you the opportunity to ask question about homework before class, the hardest part about this class is how easy it is and to not overthink it, but you do have to go to class to get a good understanding of the class. I definitely recommend her I loved her class.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Professor Crews is cool! Her lectures can be a little all over the place, but they are easy to follow in the end. You have homework assignments every week that are also great ways to learn. She really gets the point across for all topics and is willing to help with any questions needed! Super nice!

this course is generally easy, its easy to get a good hw grade and professor Crews is just great overall she takes the first few minutes of class to let you ask questions about anything you dont get, attendance isnt mandatory but you should still go

4-5 tests and a final. lots of homework. I usually only get B's and A's for courses and I really struggled with this one. Homework counts as one test grade at the end of the semester but a lot of people struggled with the tests. The lectures were dull at times and hard to apply to the homework. Difficult class overall, take Algebra instead.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Professor Crews is very good at what she does. She teaches the content well and always makes sure that everybody's questions have been answered. There is a lot of homework on WebAssign, but it really helps you become familiar with the content. She posts Practice Tests to WebAssign as well that are very similar to the real tests and help you do well

This class was easy to pass. All homework is due online. You don't need to buy the book. Her test are just like the homework. If you do bad on a test and you do well on the final she will replace your lowest test grade with your final. She makes you sign but there is no penalty for not going. She is always willing to answer questions after class.

She's the sweetest person ever ! She does take attendance and explains the homework in class so if you go you basically get your homework questions answered. She explains things EXTREMELY well, if you fail it's simply because you just didn't try. She stays a few minutes after class to help as well, do the homework and you'll pass with flying colors

Her style of teaching just wasn't for me. She would move too fast and didn't explain concepts properly before moving onto the next concept. The tests are very close together and there's a lot of online homework. I basically had to teach myself the whole semester.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Online homework is a huge part of the grade, but the website is a huge pain and she's not even sure how to use it. 4 tests and a final. Very boring class to sit through and very confusing with what she's teaching. Nice person but definitely not the best teacher.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Prof. Crews was great. Shes very willing to help if you dont understand, but if you show up you will most likely get most the concepts. She works everything out step by step, so I found the class pretty easy.

Professor Crews was an amazing teacher. She spent the first bit of class answering any homework questions and was willing to stay after class to help you if needed. Attendance isn't mandatory but she is more willing to help your grade if you come to class. Textbook isn't used but you have to buy it to complete the homework online.

Good teacher if you're okay at math and just need the credit. Kind of boring and definitely makes you rethink about going to class. She is a very sweet lady and grades graciously, just make sure to do the homework on web assign. The tests are close together and no quizzes.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Professor Crews is not the professor to take if you struggle in math. She does not explain very well and all homework and textbook is online. Tests are in class and they are very close together. I struggled on the tests but did well on the homework. No quizzes.

Mrs. Crews was great. Textbook was used online & often. Math is dull but she is a sweet lady and a good teacher who will help you when/if you need it. If you give her respect and show up to class, she'll help you as much as she can. Test are very similar to practice test she gives (not graded) and she is a lenient grader if you show your work.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Pass or fail class. Mrs. Crews was great for learning support because she always explains everything in a different way than the primary instructor, and she communicates with the primary professors on a regular basis. She does not move on until the students thoroughly understand the material. Very patient, kind, and happy.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: I took Crews for my first semester back in college in 10 years, and I couldn't have had a better experience. I wish I could take her for every class, but obviously that isn't possible. She really takes time to explain concepts and has absolutely no problem when you ask a question - she'll gladly go back over things that you don't understand.

Overall, I like Proffessor Crews. She genuinely cares about all of her students' sucess in her class. She is there to help you, and I love how much she loves questions. She will answer ALL of your questions when she is teaching which is super helpful when it comes to math. She also is good about extending deadlines and giving partial credit.

I love Mrs. Crews. She is such a sweet lady and really wants to help people pass. Easy class as long as you attend, and even if you have trouble she's more than willing to help. She's also pretty funny too. One of my favorite professors this semester.

Professor Crews is one of the best math teachers I've ever had. She is very helpful, and she teaches things in a way that is very easy to understand. I definitely recommend her. There is barely any homework, and only 5 tests. No quizzes.

Ms. Crews is the best Math teacher I've ever had - presented the information in an easy to understand way, was always available to assist, really wanted everyone to succeed. Laid a great foundation for each new idea that she introduced.

I have her for math 97, for most that have been out of school for over 10 years you lose all knowledge of what you learned. She is a awesome teacher she is very clear, patient and easy explains things so well, she gives you excellent tips and ways of doing problems excellent I wish she could teach all my math classes. Take her class you will learn.
A really helpful teacher! Also really nice. I would take her again
Great teacher! Take her if you can.
Ms. Crews is very helpful and extremely nice!
Very great teacher, helps you when you need it and would even stay with you after class so that she can explain things better if you need it.
AMAZING!!!  I wish I could have her teach all of my math classes.  She explained math in a way that I could finally understand it.  If you have math anxiety, this is your teacher.
I have always had a difficult time with math.  Prof Crews helped me to put it all together.  I shall never fear math again!!
I loved Ms. Crews.  She was extremely helpful and a wonderful teacher.  This class was a breeze for me.  Awesome.  I wish all my classes were this easy.

Easy class if you practice your math. The online homework is a great resource through my math lab. Mrs. Crew was very helpful and explained problems clearly. Math is not easy so it's really on you to practice a lot! If you do the practice test online a lot of the questions on the tests come from the practice tests on my math lab. Highly recommended

Great teacher!  I've been out of class for 18 years.  She was clear, very patient, and was always willing to stay after class to help. I've never been good in math, however she broke things down to even the smallest step so we'd understand.  I appreciate her for that.

She's a very nice lady. She tries to help as much as she can and she makes it easy. She doesn't care about attendance and homework is easy. There are practice tests for all tests and a study guide for final. I recommend taking her.

She tries to joke a lot. And she really gets confusing she'll show you one way to do a problem and then another. Then she'll say don't do it that way this way is easier. very confusing for someone who has not taken math since 1993

COMPASS Test said I had to take the Math 0097. It has been 30 years since I was in college and Math was not one of my favorite subjects. She explains things well and has a easy going personality. Do your homework, study your notes from the class, and take the Pre-Tests and you'll do great. If you don't understand something, just ask. GREAT teacher!

This class was so easy and Mrs Crews made it easy to learn, I would have been happy just passing the class but I got an A in the class it was so easy. DO homework, and pretest (the pretest are pretty much the test you will take on test day)

She gave a syllabus the first day. Everything was very clear. Her teaching style was great. She has a sweet disposition and was always making sure we were following her in the problem solving. She had 6 graded hmwks worth 10 points each, 4 tests and 1 final. She's awesome!!!!! Do your work and come to class!

This is a remedial math class she is very clear about what she teaches and what the tests require.  I never ever had algebra in my life and I got an A!  You must attend class, do homework, ask questions and do the pretests.  Great teacher!

This is remedial math, she teaches very clearly, which I needed.  I never ever took algebra in my life and I got an A.  You must attend class, do the homework,ask questions and to the pretests.  Great teacher.
She is a really bad teacher.

Very good instructor.  Will bend over backwards to make the subject matter easy to understand.  If not able to help during class, she is available before and after to help clarify the work covered.  ATTEND CLASS!  Fastest way to get behind is to skip class.  Very straighforward grading.  Easy A or B if you study and go to class.
No Comments
